# [Interview #124: WH Signing Report - John Nowacki, Entry #5](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=124#5)

#### Robert Jordan

He was in a pretty good mood, and joked a bit about the rumors of health problemsâ€”he told a story about a couple of Hell's Angels at a signing who said they'd desecrate his grave if he died before finishing the series.
